functions.name: Button (component)
functions.signature: const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => JSX.Element)
functions.description: Composable button component supporting variants and sizes via class-variance-authority. Supports `asChild` prop to render a Slot for polymorphic behavior and forwards refs. Uses `buttonVariants` to compute CSS classes and `cn` to compose them.

notes: Exports `buttonVariants` along with the Button component for reuse.
